title: CAEDC Interactive Data Map
image-alt: screen shot of the Interactive Data Map web map application
teaser: The Interactive Data Map was developed for the Cumberland County Economic Development Corporation to promote the County to prospective businesses.  It features a custom deployment of the Esri Shortlist Storytelling web map application.
